\begin{center}
 Within-model. 
\end{center}
 \[
\begin{aligned} 
\begin{bmatrix}
 y_{1, t}^w \\
y_{2, t}^w \\ \end{bmatrix} &= 
\begin{bmatrix}
 \phi_{11} & \phi_{12} \\ 
\phi_{21} & \phi_{22} \\ 
 \end{bmatrix} 
\begin{bmatrix}
 y_{1, t - 1}^w \\
y_{2, t - 1}^w \\ \end{bmatrix} + 
\begin{bmatrix}
 \zeta_{y,1, t} \\
\zeta_{y,2, t} \\ \end{bmatrix} ,\\ 
 & \text{with}~
  \zeta_{y, i} \sim \mathit{MVN}(\mathbf{0}, \mathbf{\Psi}) 
\end{aligned}
\]
\begin{center}
 Between-model. 
\end{center}
 \[
\begin{aligned} 
\begin{bmatrix}
 \mu_{1,i}\\
\mu_{2,i}\\
\phi_{11,i}\\
\phi_{12,i}\\
\phi_{21,i}\\
\phi_{22,i}\\
\log(\pi_{1,i})\\
\log(\pi_{2,i})\\
\log(\pi_{12,i})\\ \end{bmatrix} &= 
\begin{bmatrix}
 \gamma_{\mu_{1}}\\
\gamma_{\mu_{2}}\\
\gamma_{\phi_{11}}\\
\gamma_{\phi_{12}}\\
\gamma_{\phi_{21}}\\
\gamma_{\phi_{22}}\\
\gamma_{\log(\pi_{1})}\\
\gamma_{\log(\pi_{2})}\\
\gamma_{\log(\pi_{12})}\\ \end{bmatrix} + 
\begin{bmatrix}
 \upsilon_{\mu_{1},i}\\
\upsilon_{\mu_{2},i}\\
\upsilon_{\phi_{11},i}\\
\upsilon_{\phi_{12},i}\\
\upsilon_{\phi_{21},i}\\
\upsilon_{\phi_{22},i}\\
\upsilon_{\log(\pi_{1}),i}\\
\upsilon_{\log(\pi_{2}),i}\\
\upsilon_{\log(\pi_{12}),i}\\ \end{bmatrix} ,\\ 
 & \text{with}~
  \upsilon_{i} \sim \mathit{MVN}(\mathbf{0}, \mathbf{\Omega}) 
\end{aligned}
\]
